name: MINDWORK BUSINESS SOLUTIONS CONSULTING SERVICES Limited
goal:
Mindwork Business Solutions Consulting Services Ltd-Mindwork provides communication and consultancy services, and organises a range of multi-stakeholder events (fora, day conferences, workshops, panel discussions, road shows, congresses) for private companies, non-profit organisations and public agencies. Mindwork holds ISO 9001: 2008 and ELOT 1435 certifications. Mindwork Business Solutions Consulting Services Ltd was established in 2008 and is registered in Greece and Europe.

We facilitate networking and collaboration of stakeholders, and identify opportunities and new markets in Europe, SE Europe, the Balkans and the Mediterranean region. Our services are available to countries within the EU and surrounding region where we plan to organize a diverse genre of events and congresses including but not limited to: eHealth, mHealth, health, innovation, IT, web technologies, medical devices, genomics, big data, Internet of Things, wearables, pharma, education, smart cities, active aging, silver economy, medical tourism, independent living, climate change, environment, arts and culture. We plan to participate in relevant EU projects.

One of Mindworkâ€™s initiatives is the eHealth Forum. In 2014, Mindwork organised the eHelath2014 (www.ehealth2014.org) a jointly organised event by: the Hellenic Ministry of Health - General Secretariat of Public Health and the Directorates General of the European Commission CONNECT & SANCO. Since then, Mindwork continues to organise the event independently (2015- 2016) and is preparing the event in October of 2017.
